# This contains the columns with only the required final ranks for each variable

                                            finalrank_empl,
                                            finalrank_eng,

                                            finalrank_deficit,
                                            finalrank_gen,
                                            finalrank_GDP,
                                            finalrank_pop,
                                            finalscore_security,
                                            finalrank_tourism,
                                            finalrank_hpi,
                                            finalrank_neg,
                                            finalrank_pos)

write_csv(final_score , "final_score_only.csv")
